snippet.title: DROWNED LAKE - Extended Trailer
snippet.description:
When amateur documentarist Bento vanishes while working on a story about the DROWNED LAKE, all that’s left of him is a mysterious VHS tape. The tape’s broadcast impacts three people in very unique ways…

In this top-down horror game, you’ll explore the DROWNED LAKE while fishing for strange items, managing your limited resources and surviving the dangers hidden in the waters.

For there are dangers hidden in these waters.
